title: On q-Electroweak
abstract: The q-electroweak theory obtained by replacing SU(2) by $SU_q(2)$ in the Weinberg-Salam model is experimentally not distinguishable from the standard model at the level of the doublet representation. However, differences between the two theories should be observable when higher dimensional representations are taken into account. In addition the possibility of probing non-local structure may be offered by the q-theory.
